attributes.action: Give full equality to gay and bisexual and lesbian people to match that of the race hate laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this can include reviewing the latest clause in the criminal justice act which was watered down by the house of lords to review this at some point and make sure it protects gay people from incitement to hatred fully without afecting free speach but drawing a line under the lords clause which as watered this new law down on the grouds of religious views. a line needs to be drawn to not allow anyone who intends to incite hatred or murder against gay people to avoide being prosecuted regardless of religion or not, a review of this lords clause is needed.
